description: Try our easy to follow Pear & Strawberry Crumble recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crumble,Pescatarian,Strawberry,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free,Pear
name: Pear & Strawberry Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 medium Beurre bosc pears, chopped into 2cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place pastry case onto an oven tray and refrigerate. Combine pear, strawberry, cornflour, sugar, zest, lemon juice and vanilla in a bowl and stand for 5 minutes to soften slightly.
To make the crumble, place all dry ingredients in a large bowl. Add butter and rub in using your fingertips to form large crumbs.

Transfer fruit mixture to pastry case and scatter over crumble. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden and fruit is bubbling. Cover with foil in the last 15 minutes of cooking if crumble is getting too dark.
Dust with icing sugar and serve with cream.
